mapper.select: select m.md_thumbnail_path, w.wish_id, w.member_id, w.md_id, w.wish_item, w.wish_price from md m, wish w where w.member_id = #{member_id} and m.md_id = w.md_id order by w.wish_id desc limit #{limitNum}, 10

select m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_email, m.member_pwd, m.member_nick, m.member_phone , m.member_addr1, m.member_addr2, m.member_addr3, m.email_agree, m.sms_agree from member m where m.member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.update: update delivery set post_code = #{member_addr1}, delivery_addr1 = #{member_addr2}, delivery_addr2 = #{member_addr3} where member_id = #{member_id} and isdefault = "1"
